appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

appDescription.description: A description what this application does, displayed in extensions menu
appDescription.message: Dowload a collection of images by url pattern.

searchPlaceholder.description: Text will be shown in a placeholder in the text field

doSearch.description: Text will be shown on the search button.
